ingredients.content: 80 g celery stalks, cut into pieces
1 brown onion (approx. 180 g), cut into halves
2 pinches ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place celery stalks, garlic cloves, carrot, brown onion and fresh basil into mixing bowl and chop <b>5-7 sec/speed 7<b>. <b>Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add olive oil, pork mince, beef mince, bay leaf, salt, pepper and ground nutmeg and cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add red wine, water, tomato paste and tomato passata and cook <b>15-20 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Carefully remove bay leaf before serving hot.
